name: Flappy Red Hero
description:
An incredible addicting 2D action game!!
You will never stop playing Super Boy!!!
Drive your hero Super Boy through different levels to save the world.
The best game in his category thanks to the never used features.
New episodes with new levels will come regularly! Stay tuned!

Are you strong enough to accept this challenge?

How to play :
Tap the screen to get higher and release to go down.
Avoid obstacles and collect coins to raise your score.
Collect 1UP to raise your lives.

Features :
- 40 Levels in 2 Episodes
- Coins = 100 Points.
- 1UP = 250 Points.
- Different Scoreboard for each episode
- Facebook integration with screenshot on HighScore
- Great 2D pixel art graphic
- Great music by Kevin McLeod
